question: If a prescription for only one product 380812 x 5 in proscript arrives, and there is no order on Ap lines, what should We do?
description: Tu też coś moze byc, jakis dodatkowy tekst

choices.text: If you receive a prescription for e.g. 380812 x 5 devices and this is the only product on this prescription (i.e. theoretically we cannot cover the prescription). And there is no order on the SF, we create an order from customer profile with no choosing 'prescription in hand', for the smallest correct quantity (i.e.= 5 pairs) and then create a 'Correction Needed' for this prescription and a request for the prescription
Remove the prescription, mark the status to cancelled and the reason to not needed, then at the bottom in notes type `WQ`
Make a new order for a quantity of x5 and send it out

question: If a prescription comes in for either a nu-hope support product or a `P` belt and If there is an order with both products on asp lines order at should we do?
description: Tu też coś moze byc, jakis dodatkowy tekst

choices.text: In this case we follow the SF process for “missing from PX” and we treat those products as core, because these products cannot go out separately to the customer.
Match the product with the prescription and split the order, then follow the process for supprting missing Shortfall

question: If there is product CJLL onthe order and CJL in the proscript, can we send them?
description: Tu też coś moze byc, jakis dodatkowy tekst

choices.text: No, we cannot send CJLL on the order in SalesForce and CJL on the prescription in ProScript because they contain allergens to which the patient may be allergic.
Yes, Those are products that can be sent even though different prices

question: If we have one med product on the prescription and another that we can send what should we do?
description: Tu też coś moze byc, jakis dodatkowy tekst

choices.text: We need to add the med product to the prescription line items by clicking 'new' and search for it in Product and if it cannot be selected from the list enter its full name from the prescription into the Non-specified Product column and mark it as ND in the Endorsement Note
Remove the prescription because we cannot send prescriptions where there is even one med product
Send a query asking if GB can make the order for prescription, and after that we can send the order.
